 Sludge:
 
"Sludge goes to smash decepticons, sludge goes to smash decepticons" said happy SLudge while he followed Grymlock
  robertdahl <rdahl@...> wrote: Grimlock turns at the new set of orders, and transforms into his T-Rex
mode. "Bout time me Grimlock get to tear into something." he snarled
quietly, as he roared towards the exit, not watching out for Crossroads.

Strafe clenched both fists, and looked like he was going to burst, "All
right, some action, some hard action, action to sink my teeth into,
action to..." he was interupted by Lightspeed. 

"Whoa Strafe, let's get a look at the situation before we do anything
harsh." he says calmly, running towards the door. Strafe looks on
dumbfounded for a second, the gets the determined look on his face
again, 

"No way, time to tear into some Decepticons." he says, as he runs over
to the computer console, and presse a large blue button. At the push of
the button, a large hole opens up in the roof. Strafe looks up, then
leaps into the air, transforming into his futuristic jet mode, as he
zooms out of the Hidden One, heading straight up into the air.
